entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. A few showers near Zeballos and Tahsis overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections this evening and after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. A few showers near Zeballos and Tahsis in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
